abstract: An asynchronous sequence that returns the attached file as a series of bytes.
overview:
## Overview

To access the attachment file as an asynchronous sequence of bytes, get a data reader from the attachment store, and then access its [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKAttachmentDataReader/bytes] using a `for-await-in` loop.

items.description: The name of the attached file.
items.name: name

items.description: The universally unique identifier for the attached file.
items.name: identifier

items.description: The type of data stored in the attached file.
items.name: contentType

items.description: Additional data associated with the attachment in the HealthKit store.
items.name: metadata

title: HKAttachment.AsyncBytes
